price: 64. Sakyk (Muchammedai ﷺ daugiadieviams): „Ar jūs liepiate man garbinti kitus šalia Allaho? Ar jūs kvailiai?“
arabic: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأۡمُرُوٓنِّيٓ أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul afaghayra al-lahi tamurūnnī aʿbudu ayyuhā al-jāhilūna
